Stone_Mallet.display_help: Legacy of Earth summons a Stone Mallet from the very earth. Stone Mallet, deals moderate damage and can knock down foes.
Stone_Mallet.display_target_help: Legacy of Earth summons a Stone Mallet from the very earth. Stone Mallet, deals moderate damage and can knock down foes.

Animate_Stone.display_help: Earth and stone coalesce to form an incredibly tough entity that can attack your foes. The Animated Stone is not alive and is immune to Psionic damage. It is also virtually immune to Sleep, Immobilize, Disorient, and Hold effects. The entity will follow you for quite a while, and can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Recharge: Very Long
Animate_Stone.display_target_help: Earth and stone coalesce to form an incredibly tough entity that can attack your foes. The Animated Stone is not alive and is immune to Psionic damage. It is also virtually immune to Sleep, Immobilize, Disorient, and Hold effects. The entity will follow you for quite a while, and can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Recharge: Very Long

Propel_Boulder.display_help: The Family Boss can open up a portal and pull in a heavy object that her can then levitate and propel at foes!
Propel_Boulder.display_target_help: The Family Boss can open up a portal and pull in a heavy object that her can then levitate and propel at foes!

Strangler.display_help: Legacy of Earth has Held you in roots.
Strangler.display_target_help: Legacy of Earth has Held you in roots.

Stone_Armor.display_help: While this power is active, the Caster's skin becomes Stone. Stone Armor makes the Caster highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Energy and Negative Energy based attacks. They are less likely to land and affect the Legacy of Earth.
Stone_Armor.display_target_help: While this power is active, the Caster's skin becomes Stone. Stone Armor makes the Caster highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Energy and Negative Energy based attacks. They are less likely to land and affect the Legacy of Earth.

Resistance.display_help: Legacy of Earth are resistant to Smashing and Toxic Damage but vulnerable to Negative Energy.
Resistance.display_target_help: Legacy of Earth are resistant to Smashing and Toxic Damage but vulnerable to Negative Energy.

Heavy_Mallet.display_help: A more impressive form of Stone Mallet, the Heavy Mallet deals more damage, but is slower to swing. It has a greater chance of knocking down opponents. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Roots.display_help: You have been entangled which is slowly crushing you! Your Defense is reduced and you cannot Move or Fly.
Roots.display_target_help: You have been entangled which is slowly crushing you! Your Defense is reduced and you cannot Move or Fly.

Entangle.display_help: You have been entangled which is slowly crushing you! Your Defense is reduced and you cannot Move or Fly.
Entangle.display_target_help: You have been entangled which is slowly crushing you! Your Defense is reduced and you cannot Move or Fly.

Fire_Sword_Slice.display_help: Legacy of Flame has lowered your defense with his Fire Sword.
Fire_Sword_Slice.display_target_help: Legacy of Flame has lowered your defense with his Fire Sword.

Fire_Ball.display_help: You have been set on fire by the Fireball.
Fire_Ball.display_target_help: You have been set on fire by the Fireball.

Fire_Breath.display_help: The Legacy of Flame breaths forth a cone of fire that burns all foes within it's narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range.
Fire_Breath.display_target_help: The Legacy of Flame breaths forth a cone of fire that burns all foes within it's narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range.

Fire_Imps.display_help: Summons 2 to 3 small Fire Imps to a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only posses the most rudimentary instincts. Be sure to summon Fire Imps near the enemies you wish them to attack.
Fire_Imps.display_target_help: Summons 2 to 3 small Fire Imps to a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only posses the most rudimentary instincts. Be sure to summon Fire Imps near the enemies you wish them to attack.

Fire_Imps.display_help: Summons 1 to 2 small Fire Imps to a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only posses the most rudimentary instincts. Be sure to summon Fire Imps near the enemies you wish them to attack.
Fire_Imps.display_target_help: Summons 1 to 2 small Fire Imps to a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only posses the most rudimentary instincts. Be sure to summon Fire Imps near the enemies you wish them to attack.

Champion_of_Light.display_help: You can construct a powerful entity composed of pure light. Although made of light, the Phantasm is tangible and has powerful Energy attacks. The Phantasm can also fly and summon duplicates of itself. The duplicates are intangible, and cannot be harmed. The duplicates' attacks deal illusory damage similar to that dealt by Spectral Wounds. Only the original Phantasm can be healed and buffed. Recharge: Very Long
Champion_of_Light.display_short_help: Summon Champion of Light: Ranged Moderate DAM (Energy)
Champion_of_Light.display_target_short_help: Summon Champion of Light: Ranged Moderate DAM (Energy)

Hammer_of_Light.display_help: A Hammer of Light has Disoriented you.
Hammer_of_Light.display_target_help: A Hammer of Light has Disoriented you.

Light_Torrent.display_help: Unleashes a cone of light that knocks foes back.
Light_Torrent.display_target_help: Unleashes a cone of light that knocks foes back.

Fist_of_Light.display_help: A Fist of Light has Disoriented you.
Fist_of_Light.display_target_help: A Fist of Light has Disoriented you.

Light_Blast.display_help: Light Blast sends a focused beam of light at a foe that can knock him back.
Light_Blast.display_target_help: Light Blast sends a focused beam of light at a foe that can knock him back.

Light_Explosion.display_help: Hurls a blast of charged light that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.
Light_Explosion.display_target_help: Hurls a blast of charged light that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

Resistance.display_help: Legacy of Light are resistant to Energy damage but vulnerable to Negative Energy.
Resistance.display_target_help: Legacy of Light are resistant to Energy damage but vulnerable to Negative Energy.

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack. Rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down.

Energy_Torrent.display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

Resistance.display_help: The Phantasm is resistant to Lethal and Energy damage.

Stone_Fist.display_help: Legacy of Earth's Stone Fist has Disoriented you.
Stone_Fist.display_target_help: Legacy of Earth's Stone Fist has Disoriented you.

Entangle.display_help: You have been entangled which is slowly crushing you! Your Defense is reduced and you cannot Move or Fly.
Entangle.display_target_help: You have been entangled which is slowly crushing you! Your Defense is reduced and you cannot Move or Fly.

Propel_Boulder.display_target_help: The Family Boss can open up a portal and pull in a heavy object that her can then levitate and propel at foes!

Resistance.display_help: Legacy of Earth are resistant to Smashing and Toxic Damage but vulnerable to Negative Energy.
Resistance.display_target_help: Legacy of Earth are resistant to Smashing and Toxic Damage but vulnerable to Negative Energy.

Ring_of_Fire.display_help: You have been Immobilized by a Ring of Fire. It is burning you for Minor fire Damage Over Time.
Ring_of_Fire.display_target_help: You have been Immobilized by a Ring of Fire. It is burning you for Minor fire Damage Over Time.

Fire_Sword.display_help: The Legacy of Flame can summon a fire sword that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks will also do a slight damage over time.
Fire_Sword.display_target_help: The Legacy of Flame can summon a fire sword that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks will also do a slight damage over time.

Fire_Blast.display_help: You have been set on fire by the Fire Blast.
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You have been set on fire by the Fire Blast.

Resistance.display_help: Legacy of Flame are resistant to Fire damage but vulnerable to Cold.
Resistance.display_target_help: Legacy of Flame are resistant to Fire damage but vulnerable to Cold.

Light_Torrent.display_help: Unleashes a cone of light that knocks foes back.
Light_Torrent.display_target_help: Unleashes a cone of light that knocks foes back.

Slice.display_help: Legacy of Steel has lowered your defense with his Broad Sword.
Slice.display_target_help: Legacy of Steel has lowered your defense with his Broad Sword.

Stone_Fist.display_help: Legacy of Earth's Stone Fist has Disoriented you.
Stone_Fist.display_target_help: Legacy of Earth's Stone Fist has Disoriented you.

Propel_Rocks.display_help: Legacy of Earth can propel rocks at foes!
Propel_Rocks.display_target_help: Legacy of Earth can propel rocks at foes!

Resistance.display_help: Legacy of Earth are resistant to Smashing and Toxic Damage but vulnerable to Negative Energy.
Resistance.display_target_help: Legacy of Earth are resistant to Smashing and Toxic Damage but vulnerable to Negative Energy.

Fire_Smash.display_help: Legacy of Flame fire punch attack
Fire_Smash.display_target_help: Legacy of Flame fire punch attack

Scorch.display_help: The Legacy of Flame's hands are engulfed in flames, igniting the target.
Scorch.display_target_help: The Legacy of Flame's hands are engulfed in flames, igniting the target.

Flares.display_help: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.
Flares.display_target_help: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.

Resistance.display_help: Legacy of Flame are resistant to Fire Damage but vulnerable to cold.
Resistance.display_target_help: Legacy of Flame are resistant to Fire Damage but vulnerable to cold.

Fist_of_Light.display_help: A Fist of Light has Disoriented you.
Fist_of_Light.display_target_help: A Fist of Light has Disoriented you.

Light_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of light at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.
Light_Bolt.display_target_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of light at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

Resistance.display_help: Legacy of Light are resistant to Energy damage but vulnerable to Negative Energy.
Resistance.display_target_help: Legacy of Light are resistant to Energy damage but vulnerable to Negative Energy.

Gale.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Gale.display_target_help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Hurricane.display_help: The driving winds of the Hurricane are blinding you. Your Range and Accuracy are reduced.
Hurricane.display_target_help: The driving winds of the Hurricane are blinding you. Your Range and Accuracy are reduced.

Tornado.display_help: Conjures up a funnel cloud at a targeted location. The Tornado will chase down your foes, tossing them into the air and hurling them great distances. The victims are left Disoriented and with reduced Defense. The Tornado is a menacing sight, and can even cause panic among your foes. Recharge: Long
Tornado.display_short_help: Summon Tornado: PBAoE Minor DAM (Smash), Foe Knockback, Fear, Disorient
Tornado.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented by the Tornado.

Mesmerize.display_help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering him unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mesmerize.display_target_help: You have been Mesmerized and cannot act.

Mass_Hypnosis.display_help: The Hero has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.
Mass_Hypnosis.display_target_help: The Hero has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.

Total_Domination.display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

Telekinetic_Blast.display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Will_Domination.display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Psionic_Tornado.display_help: The Hero's Psionic Tornado continues to tear at your mind and slows your attack rate!
Psionic_Tornado.display_target_help: The Hero's Psionic Tornado continues to tear at your mind and slows your attack rate!

Psychic_Wail.display_help: Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. This power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for
Psychic_Wail.display_short_help: Close (AoE), Extreme DMG(Psionic), Foe Disorient -Recharge, Self -Recovery
Psychic_Wail.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.
